TopicTitle: Post pics of your oddballs and flukes.

Articles.Content:
So far, we've seen post pics of your successes and pics of your failures.

the purpose of this thread is to post pics of stuff that accidentally happened and turned out to be awesome.

ready? go!

Was preforming a standard re entry after returning from The Mun, and it just so happened there was a nice solar eclipse in view as I was re entering the atmosphere. 

[![220200_screenshots_2015-05-16_00001.th.jpg](http://hockenjos.com/upload/images/2015/06/01/220200_screenshots_2015-05-16_00001.th.jpg)](http://hockenjos.com/upload/qo)

while descending on Mun, i had leftover in my big tank that i dropped... i just forgot to cut off the brake... a few seconds later, it was going back into orbit, coming dangerously close to my lander....

![weird_zpsiescyvml.jpg](http://i88.photobucket.com/albums/k189/ankhiel/Kerbal/weird_zpsiescyvml.jpg)

> 
> while descending on Mun, i had leftover in my big tank that i dropped... i just forgot to cut off the brake... a few seconds later, it was going back into orbit, coming dangerously close to my lander....
> [http://i88.photobucket.com/albums/k189/ankhiel/Kerbal/weird_zpsiescyvml.jpg](http://i88.photobucket.com/albums/k189/ankhiel/Kerbal/weird_zpsiescyvml.jpg)

"screw crash landing, im going back into SPAAAAAAAACE" ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

also, it looks like your on Minmus, since Kerbin and the Mun are in the backround. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> "screw crash landing, im going back into SPAAAAAAAACE" ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> also, it looks like your on Minmus, since Kerbin and the Mun are in the backround. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

ooops, you're right.

I wonder tho, where did it go....
